titles.title: CREAATE Act of 2022
CREAATE Act of 2022
Cultivating Revitalization by Expanding American Agricultural Trade and Exports Act of 2022
A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to extend and expand the Market Access Program and the Foreign Market Development Cooperator Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Cultivating Revitalization by Expanding American Agricultural Trade and Exports Act of 2022 or the CREAATE Act of 2022
This bill expands and extends through FY2029 the Market Access Program and Foreign Market Development Cooperator Program of the Department of Agriculture.
